name: Depth (itch) (Alex Telford)
description:
This was a game I was working on last year, ended up not finishing it but I think it's a cool idea. You play a submarine trapped in the bottom of a dark cave and can only navigate with sonar. The original idea was to have a number of branching paths leading to the surface. If you get stuck or find yourself in an area outside the map it's probably because that section wasn't finished!

Controls:

Press Enter to pass the title screen.

Space to use sonar.

WASD to move.
